snippet.title: Wall World - Trailer
snippet.description:
Wall World is a mining rogue-lite with tower defense elements where you will be exploring the mysterious Wall on your giant robot spider. Mine for valuable resources, upgrade your equipment to fight off hordes of monsters, and discover exotic biomes in-between attacks. Will you be able to survive and learn the secrets of the World Wall?

Try out the demo now: https://s.team/a/2187290
Join Alawar's Discord: https://discord.gg/xZXBfwAvPA
